storyInfo: As the 'prodigal child' of the family, Jessica accepts her father's request and prepares to leave Blacksteel. That's when Liskarm asks her to become her deputy.

attributes.content: Yes, I got it down after one try. Your brother did too.
But it's alright. You're the youngest, so of course you won't be as good as us right away.
Let's take it one step at a time. If you don't succeed at first, just try again. If you can't get it today, pick it up tomorrow.
As long as you eventually learn it, why does it matter if it takes you a little longer?
Reporting! I've returned the last case of etched ammo to storage, and put the equipment and materials back in their places.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Jessica, are you really leaving?
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, um, yes. Sorry...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *sigh*... It's not easy for new recruits to pass our training and examinations. Now that you've officially joined Blacksteel, shouldn't you be full of excitement and fighting spirit? At least for a while?
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Plus, you were trained by Instructor Eyland.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: I only barely based the exam, and Instructor Eyland... Umm...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You're still new. You can't expect everything to go smoothly the first time.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Why are you so adamant on leaving Blacksteel anyway? Did getting hurt on that one mission spook you?
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: No, it was just a scratch, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Well, it's fine. We all have our own reasons, so if there's something you're struggling with, I won't pry.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: What did you think about the explosive-resistant shield you just tested?
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Huh? Umm... I think it was made from a newly-developed Raythean material, and felt like it would be effective against most kinds of projectiles.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But overall, it felt a bit unwieldy... Ah, s-sorry, I should've been incorporating more strength training into my daily exercise.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I won't deny, the design is a bit clunky for a Feline. Your judgment is as sharp as ever.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: You've been great, Jessica. We were able to get a ton of data from you carrying it through the whole trial.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: D-Don't mention it, I'm just doing my job... My last job here.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I suppose so. It's a shame we're losing such a capable tester.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I still have a long way to go. Sorry...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm off to HR now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sure, alright then. See you later, Jessica.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: Excuse me, is Jessica here?
Jessica? She just left, and should be on her way to HR. If there's something you want to tell her, I'll pass on the message the next time I see her.
attributes.name: Testing Supervisor

attributes.content: That's alright, I'll go look for her myself.
(I guess I'm supposed to wait here...)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Thank you very much. Our technical cooperation with Blacksteel has always been the most important part of Raythean's business, and we are especially grateful for your assistance, Mr. 'Clip.'
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Haha, that was years ago. Plus, I'd reckon there are few suppliers other than Raythean that could meet Blacksteel's demand.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Manager

attributes.content: That's true. The development and improvement of etched ammo has always been one of our top R&D priorities.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I hope we'll get to chat again next quarter, after the orders have been docked.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Manager

attributes.content: Good. Then, I'll take my leave.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Oh, you were looking for Brynley's daughter, right...? How's he doing? Tell him I said hello.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Senior Manager

attributes.content: Haha, thank you for your concern. I'll let him know.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Good day, Madam 'Jessica.' I am...
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: G-Good day, Mr. Raymond. Of course I remember you.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's no need to be so formal with me.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yes, of course. Such is Brynley's pride and joy. Thoughtful, and unpretentious.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: So how was it? Did you have a good time here?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Well... Blacksteel's training is rigorous, and I feel like I've been steadily improving. But I've still got a long way to go until I can become a qualified mercenary.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It seems like you've also found this trip worthwhile. That's great to hear.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I believe you and your father have not seen each other for two years, right? Mr. Brynley has been waiting for you to return home.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Are you through with the resignation procedures? And is your luggage prepared? I'll have someone over to load everything onto the transport.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Mr. Raymond, um, w-wait a minute please...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hm? Is something amiss?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: The last time you came here, you said that Father wanted me to return home... but if I found my own path at Blacksteel Worldwide, I'd be allowed to stay.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: So, I want to know...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I see. At first, Mr. Brynley acknowledged your ambitions and allowed you to join Blacksteel, to broaden your horizons and find yourself.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: But he's come to learn that Blacksteel has been smothering your abilities, and though he is filled with regrets, he still allowed you three months to decide whether you wanted to stay.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I understand... My performance here has not been enough to earn Father's acknowledgement.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sorry. I tried my best, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, I should be apologizing, Madam Jessica. I might be repeating myself here, but I hope you'll hear me out. Your father wants you to go home for a variety of reasons.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: You're currently working in the Department of Equipment and Applied Technologies. Blacksteel can take full advantage of your background here, but for you, there's no denying that you're vastly overqualified.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: You know I'm not very talented...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The top-of-the-line equipment you handle here at Blacksteel is nothing but the product of endless internal testing at Raythean.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Since you're interested in this work, why not return to Raythean, where you can truly flex your muscles and make a difference?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: And this hardly bears repeating, but it is your family business, after all.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: By your father's side, you are guaranteed to have all the resources you could ever want at your disposal, as well as the room to fully express yourself.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: You wouldn't need to work your way up from a lowly equipment tester, nor would your contributions go ignored for long periods, as they are now.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Look at you. You hardly look like the scion of the Brynley family.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: S-Sorry... I'm just too useless...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Come on now, Madam Jessica, enough with the self-deprecation.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: By the way, I heard you were injured on a recent field mission. Is that true?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Um, it's because I didn't train enough and got too nervous in a combat situation... Sorry, I still need to polish my skills more.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I see. You understand now, right? Being a mercenary is a dangerous, life-threatening affair.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: No matter how hard you train, there's always the risk of injury.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I also have a young daughter, and I also understand the love Mr. Brynley has for you, so please don't take this the wrong way.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Mr. Brynley encouraged his children to go out on their own, as a good father should, and he would've appreciated it if you were able to start something of your own, like your sister did.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: But, you are his youngest daughter. Mr. Brynley still hopes that you can draw on the experiences of those who've come before you, suffer fewer hardships, take fewer detours, and return home as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Compared to your brother and sister, you're not as socially skilled as them, nor have you dedicated yourself to mechanical design.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Carving out a domain for yourself relying solely on your physical prowess and combat abilities is still out of your reach.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: You're certainly not wrong...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Mr. Raymond... I keep letting you and my father down.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nonsense. Besides, Raythean can always make you a custom set of equipment to enjoy on your return.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: If you had better protective gear, you would've been fine in a small skirmish like that.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: But even if I had access to the best gear... what would I be able to do with it?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: All that matters you put the equipment we've painstakingly made to good use. You don't have to think too hard about what you want to do with it.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Oh right, Fort Barron is still a fair distance away. Could you enjoy desserts made by a gold-medal chef here?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I remember when you came to my office a number of years ago, Mr. Brynley directed me to order an entire table of desserts.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Um... Training here involves strict dieting...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Though, I still buy snacks every now and then... Ugh, if only I had more self-discipline.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Please don't be too tough on yourself, Madam Jessica. I think you've worked hard enough.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Earlier, I spoke to Mr. Eyland, your training instructor, and he didn't have much of an impression of you, except the fact that you train very hard.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Even a respected, elite mercenary like Eyland found nothing lacking in your performance. Though you didn't particularly stand out either, your hard work helped you narrowly pass the exam.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: What is there to blame yourself for?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Instructor Eyland...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sorry... I get nervous just thinking about him...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Good grief, this is exactly what Mr. Brynley has been worried about. You've already endured so much hardship here.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: But I'm glad to see that you've put up with all of it. You've now gained valuable experience, and honed your already excellent qualities. If you were to return home, I'm sure you'd...
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I haven't finalized my resignation process yet, and... um, before I leave, I'd like to... say goodbye to my friends. Can I have a bit more time?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *sigh*... I'm afraid this will disrupt the schedule, and your father is waiting for you to return home... But of course, it's all up to you.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: A-Alright... Sorry again...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'll head back to the HR Department then...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Phew... haah.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...The wind on the barrens.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: In a corner of the empty outdoor training ground, Jessica closes her eyes and forcefully inhales the air that reeks with the scent of Originium gunpowder.
She silently spent countless hours of her leisure time here in order to pass the examination that fails out nearly 80% of new recruits.
(Have I experienced all of this vast, boundless land?)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (Not quite, right?)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (Outside of a few small skirmishes, I've stayed back at the base most of the time, training and testing.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Two years ago, for the first time, she mustered up the courage to talk to her father about the steps she was about to take.

Her family had already selected a school and specialization for her advanced studies. She even had her job after graduation planned out for her, but she wanted to submit her resume to Blacksteel Worldwide.
She told her father that she still didn't know what she was capable of, so she wanted to further refine herself.
Besides, her father always said that the land was vast and boundless, holding infinite possibilities in life.
So she wanted to experience more in life, and find her own possibilities.
(But, I've already finished packing my bags.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (And I think... I'm done saying my goodbyes.)
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sorry... I couldn't accomplish anything in the end...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's the matter with you?
Oh, um...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm really sorry! I, I was just...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Wait, don't run off
I'm from the BPRS Division, codename 'Liskarm.' You're Jessica, right?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yes! H-Hello, Liskarm, ma'am...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I was just looking for you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The colleagues in your department said you went to the training grounds, but the staff there said they hadn't seen you. Luckily I was passing by the outdoor training area and decided to take a look, and lo and behold.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I was hoping to talk to you personally.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I've had a change of station and I'm now in need of a deputy. After sifting through Blacksteel's HR files, I thought you'd be the best fit for the position.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: O-Okay... Wait, huh?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You mean... You want me to as your deputy? Me?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yes. I'm looking for a capable all-rounder.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But, I don't think I'm...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I don't know much about your specific abilities other than the exam data in the files. But, I sat down and had a chat with Joseph, and he thought you'd be a good fit.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Joseph... Instructor Eyland? But, he said he didn't have much of an impression of me...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Huh? No, we happened to have time to chat over dinner a couple days ago, and he thought you'd make an excellent deputy, and a good fit for my personal style.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: He told me how you thought it'd be impossible to pass the selection examination, but you still spent every day in the training grounds.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Are you alright? You look like you're having a hard time.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I, I'm sorry...!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I was actually about to leave Blacksteel...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are you having second thoughts?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You seem pretty attached to these training grounds. Why are you leaving?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Because I haven't done a good job.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Did you already return your gun?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: N-Not yet...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then draw it out and show me what you've got. Treat this as a practical.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: R-Right here? But, there's no protective gear...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't worry, I've got my shield. Plus, didn't you launch an attack on Joseph during a live combat training session that even he wasn't able to neutralize?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Th-That was just an accident!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Not bad. You're a pretty nice shot. Acceptable accuracy.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But your bullets... don't have enough of a bite.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Calm down.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Don't look away. Keep your eyes on your opponent
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Good reactions. You've got the conditioned reflexes. That's a product of your training.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But live combat situations are always trickier than training.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Waah!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: S-Sorry... I wasn't able to dodge...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You've already passed. You don't know my Arts.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Alright, on your feet.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Did I... really pass?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Yes. I have to say I don't agree that you 'haven't done a good job.' You just aren't experienced or practiced enough, but that's true for all fresh recruits.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Not experienced enough...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Liskarm, ma'am, may I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hm? Even though I'll be asking you to train, I'm not much of an instructor myself... Well, whatever, what is it?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: When... did you realize you were cut out to be a mercenary?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Cut out to be a mercenary? Still don't know if I am, and haven't thought much about it. All I know is it's what I want to do.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What if you're not a good fit for the job? Aren't you afraid you'll end up having to take detours?
Or, maybe, people's lives shouldn't have to roll down a single, predetermined track. Pick a road and follow it through, wherever it might lead.
Thank you. Thank you for acknowledging me.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I think...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: She clenches her fist, just as she had done that day when she stood in front of her father's office.
This is what 'Jessica,' Blacksteel mercenary, decided for herself.
...I would like to take this opportunity.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Good, very good.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But just so we're clear, I'm warning you in advance that my BPRS is a very unique division... It's fringe work, and always extremely dangerous.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We deal with Infected organisms and acute Originium contamination incidents, to give you an idea of the risks involved.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I, I understand...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: When facing a normal operation, most injuries you might suffer can be fully healed. But when you're out with BPRS, more serious wounds might mean that you contract Oripathy.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I've seen enough of your files to know that you sustained minor injuries on your last mission.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Of course, BPRS is equipped with comprehensive protective measures, and Director Janet has been working hard to improve the division's emergency responses, to reduce the risk of infection.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Also, if you become my deputy, I'll have higher expectations for your training. I will not deploy you on dangerous missions until you've fully met those expectations.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So that's the situation. I came to you before starting an inter-department transfer application, just so you can decide what you want to do.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Thank you... But I've already made up my mind!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'll continue to broaden my experiences, and get more rigorous training... Then, I'll find my own answers.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: N-Not just answers to my own questions, but also those about life and how to live it... In the course of my missions, I've seen things that I'm still confused about, even now.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Is that so? I apologize, but I might not be able to give you the answers you're looking for.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But I'm glad that my deputy thinks about these same issues.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Your deputy...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Were you going to HR to finish your resignation? I'll go with you, make it easier to withdraw the application.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ah, yes, alright... Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But, what should I say to Mr. Raymond and Father...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Is something wrong, Madam Jessica?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Um... What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I can't exactly wander around inside Blacksteel, so I went outside.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: If I heard correctly, you said you were withdrawing your resignation application?
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: Liskarm...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, it's fine. I'm sorry, Mr. Raymond, but I don't plan on going home.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Please... tell my father, that 'Jessica' wants to stay with BSW no matter what. As a mercenary working for a security firm, protecting people, solving problems.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I haven't found what my 'possibilities' are yet, but I want to keep searching.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: I will let him know.
attributes.name: Raythean Industries Representative

attributes.content: My little girl still wants to keep being 'Jessica' of Blacksteel Worldwide...? That stubbornness is exactly what you'd expect from a child of the Brynley family.

I apologize for making you say so many harsh things to her, but I need to know that she's strong enough to find her own footing, not just drifting along the currents in the one place she's been thrown.
Of course, I'd prefer not to see her suffer. There is too much cruelty in this world, and she will have many questions to which there are no easy answers.
But if she wants to be a challenger, then so be it. Even if she's the last child in the family to find out what she should do in life... or she never finds it.
